Assess heart rate: 
/circle6   Feel the pulse in the umbilical cord or listen to the heart beat with a stethoscope while 
you stop ventilation for 6 seconds. 
/circle6   Feel the pulse in the umbilical cord where it is attached to the babyâ€™s abdomen.
